title: Act (No. 28 of 2022) (other than section 45(2)(d)) shall come into operation.
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Remediation of Dwellings Damaged by
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Remediation of Dwellings Damaged by 
the Use of Defective Concrete Blocks Act 2022 (Commencement) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited remediation dwelling damaged use defective concrete block act 2022 (commencement) order 2023

title: Act (No. 28 of 2022) (other than section 45(2)(d)) shall come into operation.
heading: 2. The 22nd day of June 2023 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 22nd day of June 2023 is appointed as the day on which the 
Remediation of Dwellings Damaged by the Use of Defective Concrete Blocks 
Act (No. 28 of 2022) (other than section 45(2)(d)) shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

21 June, 2023. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 23rd June, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [321] 3

title: Act (No. 28 of 2022) (other than section 45(2)(d)) shall come into operation.
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

In exercise of the powers conferred on the Minister for Housing, Local 
Government and Heritage by section 1(2) of the Remediation of Dwellings 
Damaged by the Use of Defective Concrete Blocks Act 2022 (No. 28 of 2022), 
this Order appoints 22 June 2023 as the day on which the Act comes into 
operation (other than section 45(2)(d)). 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [321]
